name: browserify-demo
description: A working demo of CSS Modules using browserify

scripts.browserify: browserify -p [css-modulesify -u postcss-modules-local-by-default -u postcss-modules-extract-imports -u postcss-modules-scope -u postcss-color-rebeccapurple -u autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers '> 5%' -o dist/main.css] -o dist/index.js src/index.js
scripts.watchify: watchify -v -p [css-modulesify -u postcss-modules-local-by-default -u postcss-modules-extract-imports -u postcss-modules-scope -u postcss-color-rebeccapurple -u autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers '> 5%' -o dist/main.css] -o dist/index.js src/index.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run browserify
scripts.budo: budo src/index.js:index.js --dir=dist -- -p [css-modulesify -u postcss-modules-local-by-default -u postcss-modules-extract-imports -u postcss-modules-scope -u postcss-color-rebeccapurple -u autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers '> 5%' -o dist/main.css] | opnr | garnish
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run budo

author: Josh Johnston
